titleStmt.title: A translation of the booke of nature, into the vse of grace Performed and principally intended for the benefit of those who plead ignorance, or they are not book-learned, or that they want teachers and so thinke to excuse themselues in their sinnes. By William Evans, Mr of Arts of St Mary Hall in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Evans, William, b. 1598 or 9.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield printer to the Vniversity, and are to be sold by Thomas Huggins,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
